intro.description: In this step you will create a new Qompass Model which applies the profile and optionally MARTE GCM

item.title: Open the Papyrus perspective
item.description: Start setting up your environment's perspective.

item.title: Create a new project
item.description:
Start creating the project that will host your model or create a new model within an existing project.
File > New > Project > Papyrus project > Enter your project name, then select UML as diagram language. On the next page, choose one of the Qompass templates (currently two, one including MARTE and one without)

item.title: Create additional Papyrus model within the project
item.description: If you need to create additional models within a project, you can do this at any time using the Papyrus model wizard. Enter your model name, then select UML as diagram language. On the next page, choose one of the Qompass templates (currently two, one including MARTE and one without)
